role.argrole: amount of time arg0 needs to spend

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 只是)) (NP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 台湾)) (NP (NN 业者))) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 以往)) (VP (VV 可能) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VV 费时) (QP-OBJ (CD 多) (CLP (M 年))))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 才)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VRD (VV 摸索) (VA 清楚)))))))
(IP (NP-ADV (QP (CD 一)) (NP (NN 方面))) (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VP (VV 送到) (NP-OBJ (NN 国外))) (VP (VV 做) (NP-OBJ (NN 品质) (NN 验证))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 又)) (VP (VCD (VV 费时) (VV 费工)))))
example.arg: *PRO* 送到 国外 做 品质 验证
